user.title: Camera Connection
user.description: Enter your camera's connection details. The stream URL can be RTSP (e.g., rtsp://192.168.1.100:554/stream1) or HTTP (e.g., http://192.168.1.100/video).

data_description.camera_name: A friendly name for this camera
data_description.stream_url: The RTSP or HTTP URL of the video stream

extraction.title: Value Extraction Settings
extraction.description: Configure how the numeric value should be extracted from the camera image.

data_description.value_name: Name for the extracted value (e.g., Temperature, Pressure)
data_description.unit_of_measurement: Unit for the value (e.g., Â°C, bar, %)
data_description.decimal_places: Number of decimal places to round to
data_description.scan_interval: How often to capture and analyze frames
data_description.preprocessing: Image preprocessing method for better OCR accuracy

roi.title: Region of Interest
roi.description: Define the area of the image containing the value to extract. Set all values to 0 to use the full frame. You can adjust these later using the update_roi service.

data_description.roi_x: Horizontal position of the region's top-left corner
data_description.roi_y: Vertical position of the region's top-left corner
data_description.roi_width: Width of the region (0 for full width)
data_description.roi_height: Height of the region (0 for full height)

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the camera stream. Please verify the URL and credentials.

init.title: Camera Data Extractor Options
init.description: Adjust the extraction settings for this camera.
